response.overview: The reconstruction of all the events that were unfolding in the last days of Maidan was created by the anonymous group Jus Talionis Reconstruction Lab. It is a multi-screen projection (16 screens in total) of various videos and Internet streams synchronised to specific time points. The synchronised videos allow the viewer to watch different events happening in different corners of the Maidan as they occurred live.  First part deals with the ambush of riot forces on a Maidan protesters march towards the parliament and the following siege of the Maidan on the 18.02.2014. The events begin at 15.39 and are covered till 22.00 without interruption. Second part reconstructs the mass shootings on the 20.02.2014 on the Maidan. Reconstruction begins at 08.53 and ends at 17.31 without interruption.
response.title: Maidan Video Reconstructions
